entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the morning then changing to periods of rain in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 late in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:24 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
